incidents.name: [Global][Baremetal] - ESXi Ransomware Nevada
incidents.message:
Our teams are mobilized against the Nevada ransomware attack primarily targeting ESXi servers in version before 7.0 U3i, apparently throught the OpenSLP port (427).
So we invite you to follow the instructions in the following link: https://blog.ovhcloud.com/ransomware-targeting-vmware-esxi/
